metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17515 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** etc/ObjectList in Metview 4.7.3 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL. NOTE: a third party has indicated that the code to access this environment variable is not enabled in the shipped product.

criterions.comment: metview package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
